info.title: Trial API Credit Card Validator
info.description:
# Introduction
This is Trial API Credit Card Validator

post.summary: It is API to check the validity of the card number
post.description: Check the validity of the card number

luhnValidateUnionPay.description: This will override the default behavior to ignore luhn validity of UnionPay cards.

maxLength.description: This will override the default behavior to use the card type's max length property and mark any cards that exceed the max length as invalid.

post.summary: The cardholderName validation essentially tests for a valid string greater than 0 characters in length that does not look like a card number.
post.description: Tests for a valid string greater than 0 characters in length that does not look like a card number

post.summary: It is API to check the validity of the card expiration date
post.description: Check the validity of the card expiration date

maxElapsedYear.description: It has a default value of 19, so cards with an expiration date 20 or more years in the future would not be considered valid

post.summary: It is API to check the validity of the cvv
post.description: Check the validity of the cvv

maxLength.description: It tests for a numeric string of 3 characters in length by default.

post.summary: It is API to check the validity of the postal code
post.description: Check the validity of the postal code

minLength.description: It tests for a valid string greater than 3 characters in length by default.
